title: Ticket #3154: Testing Modifications and Requirements for 7.9 Series
description:
The following is meant to capture the modifications that will be made to testing in the 7.9 series.

The general goal is provide better automated coverage but there are other

Milestones

  • Unit Testing
    • [DONE] #3136
      Initial inline support for CTest and unit testing (boost::test)
    • [DONE] #3230
      Cleanup and shuffle many of the unit tests which are under the integration tests to be under the unit testing perview.
    • To add a unit test to the tree to be built & spun simply add condor_unit_test( target_name ${SRCS} ${LINK_LIBS} ON_OFF_LINK_BOOST_TEST_MAGIC )
    • Add another step to the nmi chain.
  • Integration Testing
    • Test suite overhaul/redux #3155 STALLED
      • Expansion of root level tests
      • Improved reliability and parallel performance
